data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the Tub.
This tub has powerful jets which gently massage your back and shoulders as you lay back in them. It's deep enough to cover your entire body with water, but no too deep that you feel like you are swimming. There is also a handy shelf upon which to place a book or drink.
The servant is here.

You are carrying a scepter, and wearing a crown and a cape.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the servant for helping me get in the bath
data.mid_motivation: i want to show compassion to my servants
data.long_motivation: i want the servants to love and honor me, especially in my old age

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give token of gratitude to servant

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give thanks to servants of the castle
